query:
SELECT l.id, l.title, l.titleFr, l.type, m.title as moduleName 
FROM lessons l 
JOIN modules m ON l.moduleId = m.id 
JOIN paths p ON m.pathId = p.id 
WHERE p.id = 1 AND l.type IN ('video', 'text')
ORDER BY m.orderIndex, l.orderIndex
LIMIT 20;
